title: Dessert Preference with Table
question_text:
A study was conducted to determine if there is a difference in dessert preference among adults based on gender. Researchers offered a random assortment of desserts to a random sample of adults and recorded each adult's dessert choice. The results can be found in the table below.
Which of the following is a true conclusion based on the above information?
tables:
Apple PieChocolate CakeSugar CookieBrownie
Female$3$$8$$4$$7$
Male$8$$2$$5$$10$

choices.text: Females chose Brownies more often than any of the other desserts.
The most common dessert choice by the males was Apple Pie.
The percent of women who chose Sugar Cookie is higher than the percent of men who chose Sugar Cookie.
Apple Pie was the dessert chosen the least, regardless of gender.
More than half of the women chose Chocolate Cake or Sugar Cookie.
